/usr/bin/c++ -Wl,--dependency-file=CMakeFiles/run.dir/link.d CMakeFiles/run.dir/src/main.cpp.o CMakeFiles/run.dir/src/grid3d.cu.o CMakeFiles/run.dir/src/poisson_system.cu.o CMakeFiles/run.dir/src/poisson_init.cu.o CMakeFiles/run.dir/src/poisson_solver.cu.o CMakeFiles/run.dir/cmake_device_link.o -o run   -L/opt/cuda/targets/x86_64-linux/lib/stubs  -L/opt/cuda/targets/x86_64-linux/lib  -lcudadevrt -lcudart_static -lrt -lpthread -ldl
